1. Allegro

Duration: 11'

Difficulty: 4.5

2. Andante

This is based on the song Verstohlen geht der Mond auf. Brahms later made an arrangement of the same song for women’s choir (WoO 38/20).

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 3
